title: 为啥玩家打不开菜单
author: xuelang123
txt_content: 为啥玩家没有权限打开钟表ChestCommands菜单，怎么设置才可以打开啊啊啊？为啥打不开，说具体点。

replies.author: Soul-Tude
replies.txt_content:
我叫aaaa9 发表于 2016-5-8 21:06
直接输入指令/mangaddp default chestcommands.command.open或者/mangaddp builder chestcommands.command. ...
楼上为正确，另外补充，如果不是基础权限组还有  /mangaddp 权限组名 chestcommands.command.open

replies.author: xuelang123
replies.txt_content:
lichi2050 发表于 2016-5-8 19:28
chestcommands.command.open
这是啥意思

replies.author: 我叫aaaa9
replies.txt_content: 直接输入指令/mangaddp default chestcommands.command.open或者/mangaddp builder chestcommands.command.open
